languages.text: {n}Исход диспута возмутил последователей Адептус Механикус. Эксплораторы сочли, что решение в пользу Ордена Молота следует зафиксировать как нарушение священных привилегий Марса и учитывать сей факт при дальнейшем взаимодействии со всеми причастными лицами.{/n}

{n}The outcome of the dispute angered the followers of the Adeptus Mechanicus. The Explorators feel that this decision in favour of the Order of the Hammer should be recorded as a violation of the sacred privileges of Mars, and that this fact should be taken into account during any further interactions with the involved parties.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Исход диспута возмутил последователей Адептус Механикус. Эксплораторы сочли, что решение в пользу Ордена Молота следует зафиксировать как нарушение священных привилегий Марса и учитывать сей факт при дальнейшем взаимодействии со всеми причастными лицами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The outcome of the dispute angered the followers of the Adeptus Mechanicus.. The Explorators felt that the decision that favours the Order of the Hammer should be recorded as a violation of the sacred privileges of Mars and that this fact should be taken into account during any further interaction with all those involved.{/n}

{n}The outcome of the dispute angered the followers of the Adeptus Mechanicus.. languages.text: {n}这场争论的结果激怒了机械修会的追随者。开拓者认为，这个有利于重锤修会的决定，应当被记录为对火星神圣特权的侵犯，这样的事实会在各方后续的沟通过程中加以考虑。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The outcome of the dispute angered the followers of the Adeptus Mechanicus. The Explorators feel that this decision in favour of the Order of the Hammer should be recorded as a violation of the sacred privileges of Mars, and that this fact should be taken into account during any further interactions with the involved parties.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这场争论的结果激怒了机械修会的追随者。开拓者认为，这个有利于重锤修会的决定，应当被记录为对火星神圣特权的侵犯，这样的事实会在各方后续的沟通过程中加以考虑。{/n}
{n}这场争论的结果激怒了机械修会的追随者。开拓者认为，任何有利于重锤修会的决定，都应当被记录为对火星神圣特权的侵犯，这样的事实会在各方后续的沟通过程中加以考虑。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El resultado de la disputa enfureció a los seguidores del Adeptus Mechanicus. Los exploradores consideran que esta decisión en favor de la Orden del Martillo debería registrarse como una violación de los privilegios sagrados de Marte, y que este hecho debería tenerse en cuenta durante cualquier interacción posterior entre las partes implicadas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The outcome of the dispute angered the followers of the Adeptus Mechanicus. The Explorators feel that this decision in favour of the Order of the Hammer should be recorded as a violation of the sacred privileges of Mars, and that this fact should be taken into account during any further interactions with the involved parties.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El resultado de la disputa enfureció a los seguidores del Adeptus Mechanicus. Los exploradores consideran que esta decisión en favor de la Orden del Martillo debería registrarse como una violación de los privilegios sagrados de Marte, y que este hecho debería tenerse en cuenta durante cualquier interacción posterior entre las partes implicadas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}論争の結果は、帝国技術局の信者を怒らせた。エクスプロレイターは、鉄槌の修道会に有利ないかなる決定は、火星の神聖な特権の侵害として記録に残すべきであり、この事実は関係者間の今後の交流に際して考慮されるべきだと感じている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The outcome of the dispute angered the followers of the Adeptus Mechanicus. The Explorators feel that this decision in favour of the Order of the Hammer should be recorded as a violation of the sacred privileges of Mars, and that this fact should be taken into account during any further interactions with the involved parties.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}論争の結果は、帝国技術局の信者を怒らせた。エクスプロレイターは、鉄槌の修道会に有利ないかなる決定は、火星の神聖な特権の侵害として記録に残すべきであり、この事実は関係者間の今後の交流に際して考慮されるべきだと感じている。{/n}
{n}論争の結果は、帝国技術局の信者を怒らせた。エクスプロレイターは、鉄槌の修道会に有利ないかなる決定は、火星の神聖な特権の侵害として記録に残すべきであり、この事実は関係者間の今後の交流に際して考慮されるべきだと感じている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'issue des débats déclenche la colère de l'Adeptus Mechanicus. Les Explorators estiment que cette décision favorable à l'Ordre du Marteau doit être considérée comme une violation des privilèges sacrés de Mars, et cela devra être pris en considération lors des échanges à venir entre les parties concernées.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The outcome of the dispute angered the followers of the Adeptus Mechanicus. The Explorators feel that this decision in favour of the Order of the Hammer should be recorded as a violation of the sacred privileges of Mars, and that this fact should be taken into account during any further interactions with the involved parties.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'issue des débats déclenche la colère de l'Adeptus Mechanicus. Les Explorators estiment que cette décision favorable à l'Ordre du Marteau doit être considérée comme une violation des privilèges sacrés de Mars, et cela devra être pris en considération lors des échanges à venir entre les parties concernées.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Ergebnis des Disputs hat die Anhänger des Adeptus Mechanicus verärgert. Die Exploratoren sind der Meinung, dass diese Entscheidung zugunsten des Ordens des Hammers als Verstoß gegen die heiligen Privilegien des Mars aufgezeichnet und bei weiteren Interaktionen der beteiligten Parteien berücksichtigt werden sollte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The outcome of the dispute angered the followers of the Adeptus Mechanicus. The Explorators feel that this decision in favour of the Order of the Hammer should be recorded as a violation of the sacred privileges of Mars, and that this fact should be taken into account during any further interactions with the involved parties.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Ergebnis des Disputs hat die Anhänger des Adeptus Mechanicus verärgert. Die Exploratoren sind der Meinung, dass diese Entscheidung zugunsten des Ordens des Hammers als Verstoß gegen die heiligen Privilegien des Mars aufgezeichnet und bei weiteren Interaktionen der beteiligten Parteien berücksichtigt werden sollte.{/n}

{n}Das Ergebnis des Disputs erzürnte die Anhänger des Adeptus Mechanicus. Die Exploratoren sind der Meinung, dass jede Entscheidung, die den Orden des Hammers begünstigt, als Verstoß gegen die heiligen Privilegien des Mars aufgezeichnet werden sollte. Und dass dies bei weiteren Interaktionen zwischen den beteiligten Parteien berücksichtigt werden muss.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tartışmanın sonucu, Adeptus Mechanicus müritlerini öfkelendirdi. Keşiftörler, Çekiç Tarikatı'nın lehine verilen bu kararın Mars'ın kutsal haklarının bir ihlali olarak kaydedilmesi ve dâhil olan taraflar arasında oluşabilecek tüm etkileşimlerde bu hakikatin dikkate alınması gerektiğini düşünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The outcome of the dispute angered the followers of the Adeptus Mechanicus. The Explorators feel that this decision in favour of the Order of the Hammer should be recorded as a violation of the sacred privileges of Mars, and that this fact should be taken into account during any further interactions with the involved parties.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tartışmanın sonucu, Adeptus Mechanicus müritlerini öfkelendirdi. Keşiftörler, Çekiç Tarikatı'nın lehine verilen bu kararın Mars'ın kutsal haklarının bir ihlali olarak kaydedilmesi ve dâhil olan taraflar arasında oluşabilecek tüm etkileşimlerde bu hakikatin dikkate alınması gerektiğini düşünüyor.{/n}
